Source code for python_codes.general

import numpy as np



[docs]def cosd(theta):
    return np.cos(theta*np.pi/180)




[docs]def sind(theta):
    return np.sin(theta*np.pi/180)




[docs]def tand(theta):
    return np.tan(theta*np.pi/180)
